activities.name: Fetch the last TransId
activities.description: Fetch last transaction Id from transaction table of transactions

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT MAX(TRANSACTIONID) AS MAXTRANSID FROM TRANSACTIONS

TRUNCATE TABLE Transactions_Staging;
select count(*) from Transactions_Staging

TRUNCATE TABLE Transaction_AlertStaging;
select count(*) from Transaction_AlertStaging

TRUNCATE TABLE Transaction_AlertStaging;
select count(*) from Transaction_AlertStaging
SELECT MAX(TRANSACTIONID) AS MAXTRANSID FROM TRANSACTIONS

TRUNCATE TABLE Transactions_Staging;
select count(*) from Transactions_Staging
SELECT MAX(TRANSACTIONID) AS MAXTRANSID FROM TRANSACTIONS

TRUNCATE TABLE Transaction_AlertStaging;
select count(*) from Transaction_AlertStaging

oracleReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKINGTRANSACTIONS WHERE TRANSACTIONID > @{variables('transid')} and transactionId <= @{variables('transidlimit')}

SELECT *
FROM DNACUSTOM.VW_DIGITALBANKINGTRANSACTIONS
WHERE TransactionFiscalDate >= TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('StartDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"')
AND TransactionFiscalDate <= TO_TIMESTAMP('@{variables('EndDate')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"')
ORDER BY TRANSACTIONID, SUBACCTNBR;

activities.name: Fetch the date
activities.description: Fetch the date before 18 months ago

source.oracleReaderQuery: select  TRUNC(SYSDATE - 2) - INTERVAL '18' MONTH AS FIRSTTRANSDATE FROM DUAL

source.sqlReaderQuery:
TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.Transactions;
select count(*) from dbo.Transactions
SELECT MAX(TRANSACTIONID) AS MAXTRANSID FROM TRANSACTIONS

TRUNCATE TABLE Transaction_AlertStaging;
select count(*) from Transaction_AlertStaging
